body.p:
Mt Washington July 8th 1861
To His Excellency
Governer Magoffin
Dear Sir

This is accompanied by a petition in behalf of Preston Troutman in regard to a fine assessed against him at the last term of our Circuit Court, the amount of said fine is $300 -- which amount he is not well able to pay -- The offense for which he was fined was sanctioned by most of the citizens of this vicinity. I would therefore respectfully request you to interpose your constitutional perogative and remit the fine.
